# summarize scores
summarize_scores(' lstm' , score, scores)
# plot scores
days = [' sun' , ' mon' , ' tue' , ' wed' , ' thr' , ' fri' , ' sat' ]
pyplot.plot(days, scores, marker=' o' , label=' lstm' )
pyplot.show()
